domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Survivor
entity.description: Eighteen castaways are put on an island with the ultimate goal to outwit, outplay and outlast. In the end, only one will remain to claim the title of Sole Survivor and win the $1 million prize.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
